p: In this study, we used the directed human protein interaction network [ 20] for the analyses; it contains 6338 genes (vertices) and 34814 directed interactions (arcs). To evaluate the relative prediction accuracies for cancer genes between our methods and existing methods, we collected cancer-related gene sets from five public databases: ONGene [ 21], TSGene [ 22], CGC [ 23], NCG [ 24] and MSigDB C6 [ 25]. Since not all genes from the data sets are contained in the directed human protein interaction network, we filtered the common genes in both a certain data set and the network. The sizes of these data sets are shown in Table 1.
